title: U.S. Marine Corps Eagle Globe and Anchor Veteran Sierra Pacific Full-Zip Fleece Vest
features: Embroidered at our facilities in Scottsboro, AL
Offically Licensed by the United States Marine Corps
Supports the Morale, Wellness, and Recreation (MWR) Program of the U.S. Marines
description: Due to supply chain disruptions, some colors and sizes may not be available in the Sierra Pacific Brand, in these cases our quality Featherlite Brand will be used. Feel free to call in advance of your order, with questions you may have.

MilitaryBest is expanding it's line of Men's apparel with this fine U.S. Marine Corps Eagle Globe and Anchor Veteran Sierra Pacific Full-Zip Fleece Vest . This Sierra Pacific Full-Zip Fleece Vests feature a convertible collar with dyed-to-match zipper pull, oversized nylon reinforced slash pockets, and an elastic hem. They are made out of 100% anti-pill polyester. This vest will make an excellent addition to your wardrobe, or a fine gift. Your satisfaction is guaranteed! These Vests are custom embroided at our facilities in Scottsboro, AL when you place your order.
